-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | An "attoparsec" adapter for "list-t"
--   
@package list-t-attoparsec
@version 0.4.0.2

module ListT.Attoparsec

-- | A text message and a list of contexts, as per the failure in
--   "attoparsec".
type Error = (Text, [Text])

-- | Given a text parser, produces a transformation of a stream of text
--   chunks into a stream of parsed results. In case of a parsing failure
--   it raises an <a>Error</a> in the <a>EitherT</a> monad over the base.
stream :: Monad m => Parser a -> ListT m Text -> ListT (EitherT Error m) a

-- | Consume only as much input as needed to run the provided parser once.
--   Results in either a failure or the parsed result and the leftover
--   stream.
consume :: Monad m => Parser a -> ListT m Text -> m (Either Error (a, ListT m Text))
